pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Method to Download Department of Education College Scorecard Data // A method to download Department of Education College Scorecard data using the public API https://collegescorecard.ed.gov/data/data-documentation/. It is based on the 'dplyr' model of piped commands to select and filter data in a single chained function call. An API key from the U.S. Department of Education is required.
